attributes.action: please we BEG you, just go!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is enough. An awful period of British Political history with squandered monies and appalling non-elected Leadership needs to be brought once and for all, to an end. Please Gordon, look up, listen to the people and call an election. We are a democracy, not your Dictatorship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
